Table.name: Abstract_instrument_role
Table.commentInRDBMS: An Abstract instrument role is a role an Instrument may act in.

Column.name: Instrument_role_type
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between different roles an instrument may act in. Examples are financial asset instrument, financial liability instrument.

Column.name: Instrument_identifier
Column.comment: An identifier applied by the reporting agent to uniquely identify each instrument under a single contract. Each instrument must have one instrument identifier. This value will not change over time and cannot be used as the instrument identifier for any other instrument under the same contract.

Column.name: Forbearance_measure_type
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between refinanced debt, instruments with modified interest rate below market value and other modified terms.

Column.name: Default_status_type
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between default because unlikely to pay, 90/180 days past due or both according to Regulation (EU) 575/2013, Article 178.

Column.name: Abstract_instrument_role_type
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between Instrument role and OTC derivative role.

Column.name: Accounting_classification
Column.comment: Accounting portfolio where the asset or liability is recorded in accordance with the accounting standard – IFRS or national GAAP –under Regulation (EU) 2015/534 (ECB/2015/13) applied by the observed agent's legal entity.

Column.name: Accounting_hedge_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator specifying if the hedge is considered an accounting hedge or not.

Column.name: Balance_sheet_recognition_status
Column.comment: Balance sheet recognition of the financial asset.

Column.name: Debt_financing_according_to_AnaCredit_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator to specify wheather an instrument is considered as debt financing according to Regulation (EU) 867/2016, allowed value for the data attribute purpose: "Financing of outstanding or maturing debt. This includes debt refinancing.".

Column.name: Exposure_with_recourse_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator specifying if an instrument is an instrument with or without recourse.

Column.name: Fair_value_designation
Column.comment: Defines the reason to irrevocably designate a non derivative financial instrument at fair value through profit or loss (use of fair value option). Is not applicable for nGAAP based on BAD.

Column.name: Fair_value_hierarchy
Column.comment: Level of fair value of financial instruments according to the hierarchy defined in IFRS 13. Applicable to national GAAP based on BAD only if the allocation of instruments is measured at fair value according to different levels.

Column.name: Fair_value_option_designation
Column.comment: Defines the reason to irrevocably designate a non derivative financial instrument at fair value through profit or loss (use of fair value option). Is not applicable for nGAAP based on BAD.

Column.name: Financial_asset_instrument_type_by_CRR,_Article__(Retail_exposure)
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between financial assets that may potentially be classified as retail exposures and non-retail exposures.

Column.name: Financial_asset_instrument_type_by_fixed_interest_rate
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between financial asset instruments with and without fixed interest rate.

Column.name: Financial_asset_instrument_type_by_interest_rate_only
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between financial asset instruments with and without interest only.

Column.name: Financial_asset_instrument_type_by_renegotiation_status
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between financial asset instruments with and without renegotiations.

Column.name: Held_for_sale_indicator
Column.comment: A variable indicating the Non-current assets and instruments in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS5. Is not applicable under national GAAP based on BAD.

Column.name: Impairment_assessment_method
Column.comment: The method by which the impairment is assessed, if the instrument is subject to impairment in accordance with applied accounting standards. Collective and individual methods are distinguished.

Column.name: Impairment_status
Column.comment: Type of impairment.

Column.name: Lower_of_cost_or_market_(LOCOM)_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator specifying if an asset is classified as lower of cost or market (LOCOM).

Column.name: Non-performing_prior_to_forbearance_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator specifying if an asset is classified as non-performing prior to forbearance according to Regulation (EU) 680/2014, Annex V, part 2.263.

Column.name: Payment_frequency
Column.comment: Frequency of payments due, either of principal or interest, i.e. number of months between payments.

Column.name: Performing_forborne_exposure_under_probation_reclassified_from_non-performing_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator specifying if an asset or off-balance sheet item is classified as performing forborne exposure under probation reclassified from non-performing according to Regulation (EU) 680/2014, Annex V, part 2.261.

Column.name: Project_finance_loan_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator to specify if the loan is considered a project finance loan or not.

Column.name: Prudential_portfolio
Column.comment: Classification of exposures in the trading book as defined in Article 4(1)(86) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013.

Column.name: Purchased_credit-impaired
Column.comment: Purchased credit-impaired

Column.name: Purpose
Column.comment: Classification of instruments according to their purpose.

Column.name: Reference_rate
Column.comment: Reference rate used for the calculation of the actual interest rate.The Reference rate code is a combination of the reference rate value and maturity value.

Column.name: Subordinated_debt_indicator
Column.comment: An indicator specifying if an asset is considered as subordinated debt or not.

Column.name: Type_of_amortisation
Column.comment: Type of amortisation of the instrument including principal and interest

Column.name: Type_of_hedge
Column.comment: Type of hedge applicable under the relevant accounting standard.

Column.name: Type_of_interest_rate
Column.comment: Classification of credit exposures based on the base rate for establishing the interest rate for each payment period.

Column.name: Accrued_interest
Column.comment: The amount of accrued interest on loans at the reporting reference date as defined in Regulation (EU) No 1071/2013 (ECB/2013/33). In accordance with the general principle of accruals accounting, interest receivable on instruments should be subject to on-balance sheet recording as it accrues (i.e. on an accruals basis) rather than when it is actually received (i.e. on a cash basis).

Column.name: Accumulated_changes_in_fair_value
Column.comment: Amount of gains and losses from re-measurement of the asset accumulated from the initial recognition to the reference date.

Column.name: Accumulated_changes_in_fair_value_due_to_(own)_credit_risk
Column.comment: Accumulated changes in fair value due to credit risk in accordance with Part 2.46 of Annex V to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 680/2014.

Column.name: Accumulated_changes_in_fair_value_due_to_credit_risk
Column.comment: Accumulated changes in fair value due to credit risk in accordance with Part 2.46 of Annex V to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 680/2014.

Column.name: Accumulated_changes_in_fair_value_in_the_period
Column.comment: Changes in fair value accumulated from the start of the period until the reference date.

Column.name: Accumulated_impairment
Column.comment: The amount of loss allowances that are held against or are allocated to the asset on the reporting reference date. This data attribute applies to assets subject to impairment under the applied accounting standard. Under IFRS, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to 12-month expected credit losses; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to lifetime expected credit losses. Under GAAP, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to general allowances; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to specific allowances.

Column.name: Accumulated_negative_value_adjustments__Market_risk_induced
Column.comment: Accumulated negative value adjustments. Market risk induced

Column.name: Accumulated_recoveries_since_default
Column.comment: The total amount recovered since the date of default.

Column.name: Accumulated_write-offs
Column.comment: Cumulative amount of principal and past due interest of any debt instrument that the institution is no longer recognising because they are considered uncollectible, independently of the portfolio in which they were included. Write-offs could be caused both by reductions in the carrying amount of financial assets recognised directly in profit or loss and by reductions in the amounts of the allowance accounts for credit losses set off against the carrying amount of financial assets.

Column.name: Arreas_for_the_instrument
Column.comment: Aggregate amount of principal, interest and any fee payment outstanding at the reporting date, which is contractually due and has not been paid (past due). This amount is always to be reported. '0' is to be reported if the instrument was not past due on the reporting date.

Column.name: Carrying_amount
Column.comment: The carrying amount in accordance with Annex V to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 680/2014.

Column.name: Commitment_amount_at_inception
Column.comment: Observed agent's maximum exposure to credit risk on the inception date of the instrument, without taking into account any protection held or other credit enhancements. Total commitment amount on the inception date is established during the approval process and is intended to restrict an observed agent's amount of credit risk to a given counterparty for the relevant instrument.

Column.name: Date_of_default_status
Column.comment: The date on which the default status is considered to have arisen.

Column.name: Date_of_forbearance_measure
Column.comment: The date on which forbearance measure have been applied.

Column.name: Date_of_non-performing_status
Column.comment: The date on which the non-performing status has been applied.

Column.name: Date_of_renegotiation_status
Column.comment: The date on which the renegotiation status is considered to have been established or changed.

Column.name: Date_past_due
Column.comment: The date on which the asset became past due in accordance with Part 2.48 of Annex V to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 680/2014. This is the latest such date prior to the reporting reference date and it is to be reported if the instrument is past due on the reporting reference date.

Column.name: End_date_of_interest_only_period
Column.comment: The date on which the interest-only period ends. Interest-only is an instrument for which, for a contractually set period, only the interest on the principal balance is paid, with the principal balance remaining unchanged.

Column.name: Fair_value
Column.comment: Fair value as defined in IFRS 13.9.

Column.name: Fair_value_change
Column.comment: Fair value changes

Column.name: Fair_value_changes_due_to_changes_in_credit_risk_before_purchase
Column.comment: The difference between the outstanding nominal amount and the purchase price of the asset at the purchase date.

Column.name: Fair_value_changes_due_to_hedge_accounting
Column.comment: Changes in the fair value of an asset or liability, which is a hedged item and measured at amortised cost, that are recognised in the carrying amount due to the application of hedge accounting (IFRS 9.6)

Column.name: Freezing_period_in_days
Column.comment: the number of days (if any) for which the freezing period of the instrument has been applied, in accordance with EBA guidelines 2016/07 paragraph 18

Column.name: General_allowances_for_bank_risk_affecting_carrying_amount_(nGAAP)
Column.comment: General allowances for bank risk affecting carrying amount (nGAAP)

Column.name: General_allowances_for_credit_risk_affecting_carrying_amount
Column.comment: General allowances for credit risk affecting carrying amount.

Column.name: Gross_carrying_amount_excluding_accrued_interest
Column.comment: Gross carrying amount, as defined in IFRS 9 appendix A, excluding accrued interest

Column.name: Inception_date
Column.comment: The date on which the current contractual relationship originated, i.e. the date on which the contract agreement became binding for all parties.

Column.name: Interest_rate
Column.comment: Annualised agreed rate or narrowly defined interest rate in accordance with Regulation (EU) No 1072/2013 of the European Central Bank (ECB/2013/34).

Column.name: Interest_rate_cap
Column.comment: Maximum value for the interest rate charged.

Column.name: Interest_rate_floor
Column.comment: Minimum value for the interest rate charged.

Column.name: Interest_rate_spread_/_margin
Column.comment: Margin or spread (expressed as a percentage) to add to the reference rate that is used for the calculation of the interest rate in basis points.

Column.name: Provisions_associated_with_off-balance_sheet_exposures
Column.comment: The amount of provisions for off-balance sheet amounts.

Column.name: Settlement_date
Column.comment: The date on which the conditions specified in the contract are or can be executed for the first time, i.e. the date on which financial instruments are initially exchanged or created.

Column.name: Start_date_of_the_period
Column.comment: The start date of the period.
